## VaultChange type

Represents the change between two Vault states.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type VaultChange<T> = {
    type: "invalidCreation";
    invalidVault: Vault;
    error: VaultCreationError;
} | {
    type: "creation";
    params: VaultCreationParams<T>;
} | {
    type: "closure";
    params: VaultClosureParams<T>;
} | {
    type: "adjustment";
    params: VaultAdjustmentParams<T>;
    setToZero?: "collateral" | "debt";
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Vault](./lib-base.vault.md)<!-- -->, [VaultCreationError](./lib-base.vaultcreationerror.md)<!-- -->, [VaultCreationParams](./lib-base.vaultcreationparams.md)<!-- -->, [VaultClosureParams](./lib-base.vaultclosureparams.md)<!-- -->, [VaultAdjustmentParams](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentparams.md)

## Remarks

Returned by [Vault.whatChanged()](./lib-base.vault.whatchanged.md)<!-- -->.

Passed as a parameter to [Vault.apply()](./lib-base.vault.apply.md)<!-- -->.
